Redwood_City.Woodside Store: The Woodside Store also called Tripp Store, sits at 3300 Tripp Road at Kings Mountain Road, Woodside, San Mateo County, California. This building listed on the National Register of Historic Places in San Mateo County since 1985 and is listed as a California Historical Landmarks in San Mateo County. It was preserved through the efforts of the San Mateo Historical Association in the 1940s.
